## genDefaultName() function

Creates the default name for the type of given gpu object

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function genDefaultName(obj: GPUObject): "unknown" | "sampler" | "texture_2d" | "texture_2darray" | "texture_3d" | "texture_cube" | "texture_video" | "buffer" | "framebuffer" | "program" | "vbo";
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  obj | [GPUObject](doc/markdown/./device.gpuobject.md) | The gpu object |

**Returns:**

"unknown" \| "sampler" \| "texture\_2d" \| "texture\_2darray" \| "texture\_3d" \| "texture\_cube" \| "texture\_video" \| "buffer" \| "framebuffer" \| "program" \| "vbo"
